Title: VisitorResult header and unit test
Description: Add visitor_result.hpp with VisitorResult and helpers plus a focused unit test and CMake registration. No change to existing visitor interfaces.
Acceptance: Header compiles; unit test validates get_result/holds_result/is_empty behavior.

Title: CompilationUnit header and unit test
Description: Add compilation_unit.hpp with AST ownership ErrorReporter access and source metadata plus a focused unit test and CMake registration. No runtime behavior change.
Acceptance: Header compiles; unit test validates setAstRoot/releaseAst and isValid behavior.
